option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/profile_title" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<!-- First Name --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="First name:" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/firstNameET" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/hint_first_name" android:inputType="textPersonName" android:autofillHints="givenName" />
<!-- Last Name --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Last name:" android:layout_marginTop="8dp"/>
<EditText android:id="@+id/lastNameET" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/hint_last_name" android:inputType="textPersonName" android:autofillHints="familyName" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
<!-- Email (display only) --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Email:" android:layout_marginTop="8dp"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/emailTV" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceMedium" android:padding="8dp" android:background="#EEEEEE" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
<!-- Contact Number --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Contact number:" android:layout_marginTop="8dp"/>
<EditText android:id="@+id/contactET" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/hint_contact" android:inputType="phone" android:autofillHints="phone" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
<!-- Home Address --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Home address:" android:layout_marginTop="8dp"/>
<EditText android:id="@+id/addressET" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/hint_address" android:inputType="textPostalAddress" android:autofillHints="postalAddress" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
<Button android:id="@+id/saveBtn" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/action_save" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" />
<View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:background="#DDDDDD" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/change_password_title" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/oldPassET" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/hint_old_password" android:inputType="textPassword" android:autofillHints="password" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/newPassET" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/hint_new_password" android:inputType="textPassword" android:autofillHints="password" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<Button android:id="@+id/changePassBtn" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/action_change_password" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/profile_title" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<!-- Progress spinner, hidden by default --> <ProgressBar android:id="@+id/profileProgress" style="?android:attr/progressBarStyleLarge" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_gravity="center" android:visibility="gone" android:indeterminate="true" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" />
<!-- First Name --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_first_name" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/firstNameET" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/hint_first_name" android:inputType="textPersonName" android:autofillHints="givenName" />
<!-- Last Name --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_last_name" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/lastNameET" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/hint_last_name" android:inputType="textPersonName" android:autofillHints="familyName" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
<!-- Email (display only) --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_email" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/emailTV" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceMedium" android:padding="8dp" android:background="#EEEEEE" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
<!-- Contact Number --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_contact" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/contactET" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/hint_contact" android:inputType="phone" android:autofillHints="phone" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
<!-- Home Address --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_address" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/addressET" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/hint_address" android:inputType="textPostalAddress" android:autofillHints="postalAddress" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
<Button android:id="@+id/saveBtn" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/action_save" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" />
<View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:background="#DDDDDD" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/change_password_title" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/oldPassET" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/hint_old_password" android:inputType="textPassword" android:autofillHints="password" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/newPassET" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/hint_new_password" android:inputType="textPassword" android:autofillHints="password" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<!-- Confirm New Password --> <EditText android:id="@+id/newPassConfirmET" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/hint_new_password_confirm" android:inputType="textPassword" android:autofillHints="password" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<Button android:id="@+id/changePassBtn" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/action_change_password" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<resources> <string name="app_name">Capstone</string> <!-- TODO: Remove or change this placeholder text --> <string name="hello_blank_fragment">Hello blank fragment</string> <string name="title_activity_login">LoginActivity</string> <string name="prompt_email">Email</string> <string name="prompt_password">Password</string> <string name="action_sign_in">Sign in or register</string> <string name="action_sign_in_short">Sign in</string> <string name="welcome">"Welcome !"</string> <string name="invalid_username">Not a valid username</string> <string name="invalid_password">Password must be >5 characters</string> <string name="login_failed">"Login failed"</string> <string name="navigation_drawer_open">Open navigation drawer</string> <string name="navigation_drawer_close">Close navigation drawer</string>
<!-- Labels for customer track item --> <string name="label_request_id">Request ID:</string> <string name="label_date_requested">Date Requested:</string> <string name="label_status">Status:</string> <string name="more">More</string> <string name="mark_as_complete">Mark as Complete</string>
<!-- Formatted strings (use these in code to avoid concatenation) --> <string name="request_id_format">Request ID: %1$d</string> <string name="date_requested_format">Date Requested: %1$s</string> <string name="sack_qty_format">Sack Quantity: %1$d</string> <string name="service_format">Service: %1$s</string> <string name="pickup_location_format">Pickup Location: %1$s</string> <string name="delivery_location_format">Delivery Location: %1$s</string> <string name="status_format">Status: %1$s</string>
<!-- Dialog labels --> <string name="request_details_title">Request Details</string> <string name="label_customer">Customer:</string> <string name="label_sacks">Sacks:</string> <string name="label_services">Services:</string> <string name="label_schedule">Schedule:</string> <string name="label_pickup_location">Pickup Location:</string> <string name="label_delivery_location">Delivery Location:</string> <string name="label_comment">Comment:</string> <string name="label_submitted_at">Submitted At:</string> <string name="label_progress">Progress:</string>
<string name="customer_format">Customer: %1$s</string> <string name="sacks_format">Sacks: %1$d</string> <string name="services_format">Services: %1$s</string> <string name="schedule_format">Schedule: %1$s</string> <string name="comment_format">Comment: %1$s</string> <string name="submitted_at_format">Submitted At: %1$s</string> <string name="close">Close</string>
<!-- Progress --> <string name="progress_format">Progress: %1$d%%</string>
<!-- Customer profile strings --> <string name="nav_home">Home</string> <string name="nav_request">Request</string> <string name="nav_track">Track</string> <string name="nav_history">History</string> <string name="nav_profile">Profile</string> <string name="nav_logout">Logout</string>
<string name="profile_title">Profile</string> <string name="hint_first_name">First name</string> <string name="hint_last_name">Last name</string> <string name="hint_email">Email address</string> <string name="hint_contact">Contact number</string> <string name="hint_address">Home address</string> <string name="action_save">Save</string> <string name="change_password_title">Change password</string> <string name="hint_old_password">Old password</string> <string name="hint_new_password">New password</string> <string name="action_change_password">Change password</string>
</resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<resources> <string name="app_name">Capstone</string> <!-- TODO: Remove or change this placeholder text --> <string name="hello_blank_fragment">Hello blank fragment</string> <string name="title_activity_login">LoginActivity</string> <string name="prompt_email">Email</string> <string name="prompt_password">Password</string> <string name="action_sign_in">Sign in or register</string> <string name="action_sign_in_short">Sign in</string> <string name="welcome">"Welcome !"</string> <string name="invalid_username">Not a valid username</string> <string name="invalid_password">Password must be >5 characters</string> <string name="login_failed">"Login failed"</string> <string name="navigation_drawer_open">Open navigation drawer</string> <string name="navigation_drawer_close">Close navigation drawer</string>
<!-- Labels for customer track item --> <string name="label_request_id">Request ID:</string> <string name="label_date_requested">Date Requested:</string> <string name="label_status">Status:</string> <string name="more">More</string> <string name="mark_as_complete">Mark as Complete</string>
<!-- Formatted strings (use these in code to avoid concatenation) --> <string name="request_id_format">Request ID: %1$d</string> <string name="date_requested_format">Date Requested: %1$s</string> <string name="sack_qty_format">Sack Quantity: %1$d</string> <string name="service_format">Service: %1$s</string> <string name="pickup_location_format">Pickup Location: %1$s</string> <string name="delivery_location_format">Delivery Location: %1$s</string> <string name="status_format">Status: %1$s</string>
<!-- Dialog labels --> <string name="request_details_title">Request Details</string> <string name="label_customer">Customer:</string> <string name="label_sacks">Sacks:</string> <string name="label_services">Services:</string> <string name="label_schedule">Schedule:</string> <string name="label_pickup_location">Pickup Location:</string> <string name="label_delivery_location">Delivery Location:</string> <string name="label_comment">Comment:</string> <string name="label_submitted_at">Submitted At:</string> <string name="label_progress">Progress:</string>
<string name="customer_format">Customer: %1$s</string> <string name="sacks_format">Sacks: %1$d</string> <string name="services_format">Services: %1$s</string> <string name="schedule_format">Schedule: %1$s</string> <string name="comment_format">Comment: %1$s</string> <string name="submitted_at_format">Submitted At: %1$s</string> <string name="close">Close</string>
<!-- Progress --> <string name="progress_format">Progress: %1$d%%</string>
<!-- Customer profile strings --> <string name="nav_home">Home</string> <string name="nav_request">Request</string> <string name="nav_track">Track</string> <string name="nav_history">History</string> <string name="nav_profile">Profile</string> <string name="nav_logout">Logout</string>
<string name="profile_title">Profile</string> <string name="hint_first_name">First name</string> <string name="hint_last_name">Last name</string> <string name="hint_email">Email address</string> <string name="hint_contact">Contact number</string> <string name="hint_address">Home address</string> <string name="action_save">Save</string> <string name="change_password_title">Change password</string> <string name="hint_old_password">Old password</string> <string name="hint_new_password">New password</string> <string name="action_change_password">Change password</string>
<!-- Profile labels (extracted) --> <string name="label_first_name">First name:</string> <string name="label_last_name">Last name:</string> <string name="label_email">Email:</string> <string name="label_contact">Contact number:</string> <string name="label_address">Home address:</string>
<!-- Validation messages --> <string name="error_first_name_required">Please enter your first name</string> <string name="error_last_name_required">Please enter your last name</string> <string name="error_contact_required">Please enter your 11-digit contact number</string> <string name="error_contact_invalid">Contact must be 11 digits</string> <string name="error_address_required">Please enter your home address</string> <string name="error_new_password_short">New password must be at least 8 characters</string> <string name="saving_profile">Saving...</string> <string name="saving_password">Updating password...</string>
<!-- New password confirmation --> <string name="hint_new_password_confirm">Confirm new password</string> <string name="error_password_mismatch">Passwords do not match</string> <string name="error_old_password_required">Please enter your current password</string> </resources>
